definition: auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Thermal protector in motor will interrupt current when motor overheats .
sentences.chinese: 电机过热时，热保护器将会中断电流。

sentences.english: Hunting without a license will land you in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 无证狩猎将会使你陷入麻烦。

sentences.english: The results will be reported in scientific journals in the near future" , said Dr Vallotton."
sentences.chinese: 不久的将来，其结果将会发表在学术刊物上。

sentences.english: I have no idea what they are going to say, so I'll have to play it by ear.
sentences.chinese: 我一点不知道他们将会说什么，所以我只好见机行事。

sentences.english: Advanced Aeronautics booster color changes for Apollo and Carrier Drones.
sentences.chinese: 先进航空学将会改变阿波罗和舰载机的加速器颜色。

sentences.english: This announcement will arouse a feeling of anger among freedom-loving people.
sentences.chinese: 这一宣告将会激起爱好自由人们的愤怒。

sentences.english: The wedding will be held at Fuji Mount in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼将会在日本富士山举行。

sentences.english: Everyone in the energy business believes that carbon-pricing will come, but when?
sentences.chinese: 能源行业的每一个人都认为将会对碳定价，但何时呢？

sentences.english: This error will disappear after the main program has been defined.
sentences.chinese: 在您完成主程序的定义之后，该错误将会消失。

sentences.english: If we have abnormalities in practice, we will be amended .
sentences.chinese: 如果我们在作法上有异常情况，我们将会修正。

sentences.english: Those of you who are weak will be merged.
sentences.chinese: 你们当中财务较弱的银行将会被合并。

sentences.english: The research could lead to new therapies for preventing cancer metastasis.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究将会引发癌转移的新疗法。

sentences.english: Which classes benefit most from Jewelcrafting?
sentences.chinese: 哪个职业将会从宝石学中受益最大？

sentences.english: Rui Chenggang would appear to be the very model for such national image building.
sentences.chinese: 芮成钢将会成为国家形象建设的模范。

sentences.english: The new Enel plant here opens its first boiler in two months.
sentences.chinese: 二个月后，埃奈尔电厂的第一个新锅炉将会启用。

sentences.english: They will spend it all and much more before voters pronounce the verdict.
sentences.chinese: 在选民投票前，他们将会全部花光，或者再花更多。

definition: when the time comes/at the scheduled time
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
